title: CD Maturing Soon? Avoid This Costly Trap—And Make 4 Smart Moves Before the Fed Cuts Rates
description: As your CD matures, one wrong move could leave you stuck with a low rate for months or even years. Here’s how to keep your earnings high despite the Fed’s...
content:

 A proactive move before your CD matures can help you avoid low yields and stay ahead of the Fed's next move.
